text:
'Don't look back' Canada's Brady Leman says of crash before his victory in freestyle skiing 10:09am GMT - 01:05 Wed, 21 Feb, 2018 - (3:10) Featured Videos What does it mean to be a Reuters visual journalist? 
Reuters visual journalists are renowned for preserving integrity, independence and freedom from bias when capturing events that shape the world in which we live. Hear from Zohra Bensemra, Natalie Thomas and Antonio Denti on what it means to be Reuters a visual journalist Thu, 23 Nov, 2017 - (2:18) Follow Reuters: Reuters Plus | Reuters News Agency | Brand Attribution Guidelines | Careers
